pageTitle: BCBGMAXAZRIA Barbara One Shoulder Gown | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements US sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit * Imported. * Dry clean. * 100% polyester. * Fabrication: Sateen. * 60" long, measured from shoulder. A playful portrayal of Grecian draping, this one-shoulder sateen maxi dress is delicate and ethereal. Sweetheart neckline and boned bodice. Draped bow, cascading ruffle, and slit at front. Pleating at waist. Hidden back zip. Cutout detail at 3" strap. Fully lined. Description BCBGMAXAZRIA > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Max Azria worked as a designer in his native Paris for 11 years before coming to the US, laying a fine foundation for the future success of BCBGMAXAZRIA. With the French adage “Bon chic, bon genre” (“Good style, good attitude”) behind its name, BCBGMAXAZRIA clothing evokes both European sophistication and American spirit.
